h2_title: Where to Find the Elder Amourworm
content: The Elder Amourworm is an optional encounter that you can seek out while exploring the massive Webbed Hollow Portion of Chapter 4. After descending down to the Vedure Bridge Shrine, head right and cross the nearby bridge, staying to the left to find an archway with two lanterns who seem to be chattering "Big day!".
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Elder_Amourworm.md', within the main section titled 'Elder Amourworm', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Elder Amourworm'.
The content is as follows:
The Elder Amourworm is an optional encounter that you can seek out while exploring the massive Webbed Hollow Portion of Chapter 4. After descending down to the Vedure Bridge Shrine, head right and cross the nearby bridge, staying to the left to find an archway with two lanterns who seem to be chattering "Big day!".
